River Queen attempts to pack a complicated, sweeping, historical narrative into just under two hours. There are some breathtaking battle scenes and the Wanganui scenery is beautiful, well suited to this hybrid England/Australian/French/New Zealand production. The film is based on the life of Charlotte Godley and her family’s involvement in New Zealand’s history.
